title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 223.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 223.1 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) All terms used
in this Part correspond to the definitions set forth in section 220-i of the

New York State Labor Law (the "Act"). (b) This Part is applicable to all
contractors, subcontractors, and covered projects subject to the Act. (c) The term "a final administrative or court
order" means a final adjudicatory determination for which no relevant
proceeding for judicial review shall then be pending and the time for
initiation of such proceeding shall have expired. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
223.1

Adopted

New

York State Register August 28, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 35, eff. 8/28/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
